name: Winter
storyline: At the begining your character awaking at empty room, looking for the answers. Along the way, you will meet creatures that will challenge you to fight and try to get your power. Follow your destiny, let the story tell you about how the first snow fell.
summary: Winter - is an adveture third person game in medieval setting with intense gameplay and exciting combat system which allows you to use different combo moves, tricks and special atacks. Along the way, you will meet creatures that will challenge you to fight and try to get your power. Follow your destiny, let the story tell you about how the first snow fell.
